content.label: Really fun game!
I will probably end up spending hours on it
A unique twist on pong

title.label: I haven't even played it and it already look good.

content.label: This has amazing... I forgot. It looks really fun and it convinced me. I was about to say it have good quality. And it looks like your underwater. Downloading this would be really good for the price.

I'm a sucker for anything underwater and this is a feast for the eyes..
Be careful though, you might lose track of the ball(s) while admiring the graphics!
Fun take on ball and paddle games.

title.label: Love it! And PLEASE make each level easier!!

content.label:
Finally and addictive!
But I could only make it to stage 2-3. Will you please make each level easier?
This game is beautiful. I love the quotes, music, and colors. It's challenging too. I like what the devs stand for. One price no IAPs.

All of Riverman's iOS games have amazing atmosphere, graphics and gameplay and share a distinctive epic style entirely their own. So far this seems less ambitious as their last title, The Executive, a supreme distillation of the fighting genre. But it is Riverman all the same. So that means, buy it.  This is an elegant cross between breakout and pong.

title.label: Great quality game with beautiful graphics

content.label: After waiting through all of the in app purchase games, I was very glad to find a quality game with fresh gameplay and beautiful graphics.

The fact that the developer isn't including in-app purchases warrants 5 stars. I've fallen from mobile gaming because I'm tired of every game having the same 💩: lives, making you wait to play. In-game currency, which is scarcely earned. Plus in-app purchases to let you buy more lives/currency. So over it. Super excited to play this game.

title.label: Fresh look and new taste for a classic game

content.label: Recommend it if you are looking for a casual but exciting arcade game with rich content, mythical design and satisfying actions.
I've definitely not seen this kind of mashup game before and I'm really liking it. Intuitive controls and great retro-style graphics, along with the cute narratives
I have liked all of your different games keep making them👍
Pong with a purpose. Beautiful graphics. Always interesting. Cant put it down.
Nicely done, very addictive gameplay and a clever innovation on a classic.
Download it

title.label: Great game.  Doesn't save mid game.

content.label:
Awesome game.  Very fun and challenging.

However, if you are mid-game or even between stages, it doesn't save your progress.  That means you better be ready to play until you lose if you want any progress to be kept.
A very good and creative game. It is Pong reinvented, with more action, stellar graphical presentation, intriguing music and cosmic-underwater creatures that you are fighting with using a ball.
Right away it was fun and engaging.

Wow I'm so glad I listened to touch arcade and took the chance this game is awesome. 
I haven't seen a lot of the game yet Maybe some kinda endless mode as an update ? Great work guys
River man Media does it again.  Another fun and exciting game.  This time retro (pong) meets the future.
Beautiful game. It get hard pretty quickly. I love it!
Very challenging, hurts my eyes since I don't blink when I'm playing
Played this for 5 minutes and i was hooked. My new best game!
Simplicity and beauty make this game a dive into luscious fun.
The "secret text adventure" got me to rate this, ha. Game is hard as nails but you'll want to keep trying again and again. Well-made with rock-solid gameplay.
Nice graphics, fun gameplay. No IAPs.

title.label: They did the Mul-dot Mash, it caught on in a flash

content.label: Can seem a little unfair at the beginning until you level up your paddles -- one missed shot can basically end a run -- but the presentation is rich and enjoyable. Good times.

A fun game with a lot of character and polish. Beautiful graphics, interesting music, and it controls nicely. When you hit an enemy there's a really satisfying, thunky impact. The game also a lot of depth and replay-ability with the different paddles, which open up a variety of strategies and play styles (aggressive vs defensive, precision vs volume of shots, etc.). Definitely recommended!
What a great, well thought out take on classic brick breaking games. Loving it!

I rarely write reviews but had to for this. If you like the old school pong type games you'll love this. Now you have two paddles. And enemies to shoot down. 
There's a nice simple tutorial to get things going. 
The music is relaxing and the graphics are exquisite. On the Ipad Pro the music and ambient sounds are especially well done. 
Game play is well tuned and gets slowly harder and harder but never really frustrating.
Highly recommended.

This game is so unique and beautiful and the gameplay is perfect. These developers are amazing to the point that I'm just instabuying anything they put out from now on. Update: The only thing I'd change is to add the ability to select a level (or background). Please, please include that in an update, devs.
The controls are perfect for an iPhone game.  The graphics and sound are well-polished.  It is very fun.
This is an awesome game. A super great twist on a class ic game. Imagine pong plus a new style game play mode. Great graphics. Highly recommend.

Fun and unique concept on a classic genre.

Seems to not save progress when quitting app. :(
Brilliant Game! Riverman does it again!

So fun! Really challenging and rewarding as you progress. This game has a crazy name, cool enemies and power-ups and some odd level loading tips. If you played any of the other awesome games this company makes you know you're in for weird humor and well-tuned iOS action inspired by classic platformers and action games. So worth it to buy a real game!

Underwater Pong with evil creatures to kill, Power Ups, upgraded Paddles! Awesome music, too!  So weird, so fun!  Get this now!  Also, would highly recommend The Executive by this developer if you haven't tried it yet!  Real review... see, here's a random clown and a bee to prove it!  🤡 🐝
